vecUnachieved.strDescription: Resolve the incident with Reimu Hakurei.
Resolve the incident with Marisa Kirisame.
Defeat a boss without taking damage.
Resolve the incident with Sakuya Izayoi.
Resolve the incident perfectly with Reimu Hakurei.
Resolve the incident perfectly with Marisa Kirisame.
Resolve the incident perfectly with Sakuya Izayoi.

data.strFullDescription:
While the princess of the moon, Kaguya Houraisan, was hosting the Lunar Capital Exhibition, the Divine Treasue known as "The Jeweled Branch of Hourai" was stolen! 
Reimu Hakurei is now tasked to find the culprit, resolve the incident, and recover the precious Lunarian Exhibit!

[b]Lost Branch of Legend[/b] is a roguelike deckbuilder starring the girls of Gensokyo, where you collect cards, find exhibits and face off against the girls and their awesome powers!

The various Shining Exhibits can permanently add Mana to play cards. The different colors of mana provided by each can drastically affect your deck's playstyle.

We have designed over 500 danmaku patterns，each and every one of them capturing the charm of Gensokyo. Don't worry, they can safely be blocked by a barrier!

[h2][b]Reimu Hakurei[/b][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/1.png?t=1708688898[/img]
The Hakurei Shrine Maiden, who's always seen when an incident occurs.
If she gets the Lunar Treasure, she won't have problems with donations or worshipers for the rest of the year.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/1-1.png?t=1708688898[/img]
[b]Reimu[/b] specializes in using Red and White Mana.
An all-rounder good on both offense and defense, such a minor incident is easy with her expertise in resolution!


[h2][b]Marisa Kirisame[/b][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/2.png?t=1708688898[/img]
An ordinary magician living in the Forest of Magic and a compulsive collector.
She already had an intrest in the Lunar Treasure, but she's seeking treasures in general, so of course she'd be involved with the incident.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/2-1.png?t=1708688898[/img]
[b]Marisa[/b] specializes in using Black and Red Mana.
Brew potions, charge up your power, and finish them off with a flashy blow! Nothing's impossible with firepower!


[h2][b]Sakuya Izayoi[/b][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/3.png?t=1708688898[/img]
The elegant head maid of the Scarlet Devil Mansion and a servant of the ever capricious Scarlet Devil.
Surprisingly willing to get her knives dirty, she's eager to get any incident resolved ASAP.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/3-1.png?t=1708688898[/img]
[b]Sakuya[/b] specializes in using White and Blue Mana.
Toss knives, stop time, and welcome your foes to a world filled with silver blades pointed at them!


[h2][b]Cirno[/b][/h2]
[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/4.png?t=1708688898[/img]
A fairy from the Misty Lake who regularly pulls pranks on people.
In search of prank material, she brought her friends to the expo.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/1140150/extras/4-1.png?t=1708688898[/img]
[b]Cirno[/b] specializes in using Blue and Green Mana.
Freeze your enemies, call on Teammates, and show everyone the might of the The Strongest Fairy!


[h2][b]And More![/b][/h2]
•  Five playable characters, each with two starting loadouts.
•  Over 160 Exhibits to recover!
•  Over 500 Cards to collect!
•  Over 55 enemies to fight, 23 of them being familiar faces of Gensokyo!
•  37 events to encounter!
data.strSnippet: Welcome to Eientei, combine multiple colors of mana to build your ideal deck, duel with gensokyo girls, and chase back the mysterious moon treasure. Also, enjoy the unpredictable Roguelike with fantasy Danmaku!
